articles.title: General Mills launches limited-edition chicken noodle soup hard candy
articles.author: Bring Me The News
articles.summary: General Mills has launched Progresso Soup Drops, a limited-edition hard candy inspired by their Chicken Noodle Soup. The new savory candy is sold exclusively at ProgressoSoupDrops.com, with limited quantities released every Thursday this month. Each order includes a can of Progresso Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup.

articles.title: Fresh St. Market's viral Peak Donuts are coming to Vancouver
articles.summary: Fresh St. Market is launching its in-house donut brand, Peak Donuts, at its Vancouver House grocery store. Peak Donuts, known for Instagram-worthy designs and flavors, will be available at 1423 Continental Street, Vancouver. This launch follows the success of Peak Donuts in other Fresh St. Market locations.

articles.title: Pepsi to replace ‘permanent' flavor with a new one. Here's when you can try it
articles.author: Tanasia Kenney
articles.summary: Pepsi is launching a new flavor, Pepsi Wild Cherry & Cream, available in both original and sugar-free varieties starting January 20th. This new flavor will replace Pepsi Mango and will be available in 12-ounce cans nationwide and 20-ounce bottles for a limited time. Pepsi aims to deliver a special cherry and cream offering.

articles.title: Opera GX: Cyberpunk 2077 Browser Experience Unleashed
articles.author: PRN
articles.summary: Opera Limited has launched the Opera GX hub, integrating Cyberpunk 2077 into the Opera GX browser. This free hub, developed in collaboration with CD PROJEKT RED, offers gamers access to game-related content like the soundtrack, Night City map, and modding guides within the browser environment, enhancing their gaming and browsing experiences.

articles.title: Nature's Miracle Holding Inc. Addresses Nasdaq Delisting and Steps Forward
articles.author: Nature'S Miracle Holding Inc.
articles.summary: Nature's Miracle intends to develop and launch new products and services. The company is working on joint projects with manufacturers and supply chain participants, and aims to grow its business in a cost-effective manner.

articles.title: Forget Dyson: Roborock's wet-dry vacuum left my floors spotless (and it's $167 off)
articles.author: Maria Diaz
articles.summary: Roborock launched the Flexi Lite, a wet-dry vacuum and mop, capable of handling both wet and dry messes. The self-propelled vacuum features separate clean and dirty water tanks for efficient cleaning and is currently offered at a discounted price of $200 for new year's promotional.

articles.title: I spent hours testing ChatGPT Tasks - and its refusal to follow directions was mildly terrifying
articles.author: David Gewirtz
articles.summary: ChatGPT has launched a new beta feature called 'Tasks' for its paid subscribers. This feature enables users to schedule prompts that will run at a specified time, offering single or recurring executions. Users need a Plus (or better) paid account to ChatGPT and select the GPT-4o with scheduled tasks model to use the feature.

articles.title: Amazon's cordless vacuum cleaner with 'great suction' £90 cheaper than Shark
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Amazon features the Powerffy Cordless Vacuum Cleaner for £89.99, boasting a 2200mAh battery with a 45-minute runtime and 30Kpa suction power. This appliance offers adjustable modes and LED lights for efficient cleaning, positioning itself as a budget-friendly alternative to Dyson and Shark vacuums. It includes a bracket to hang it and place on the wall.

articles.title: For teenagers, Benchsitters feel like friends
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Bankzitters, a Dutch collective, is embarking on a world tour following sold-out shows in Amsterdam. The tour includes stops in major cities like New York and Tokyo. This tour marks their expansion to an international stage.

articles.title: Locally-owned car wash to open first Austin location this fall
articles.author: Sarah Hernandez
articles.summary: Cosmic Express Car Wash will debut a prototype building with a mid-century modern design at its new location in Austin.

articles.title: Progresso launches Soup Drops, a hard candy that's 'soup you can suck on'
articles.author: Terry Dickerson
articles.summary: Progresso, a brand of General Mills, launched a limited-edition product called Soup Drops, savory lozenges that mimic the taste of Progresso Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup. Available starting January 16th exclusively at ProgressoSoupDrops.com, each order included a can of the actual soup. Despite selling out quickly, the company planned to restock the Soup Drops every Thursday during National Soup Month.

articles.title: Pick up the Dyson Digital Slim Cordless Vacuum for 50% off today from Amazon
articles.author: P.J. McCormick
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Dyson Digital Slim Cordless Vacuum at 50% off. This cordless vacuum features powerful suction, a lightweight design, advanced digital motor technology, multiple attachments, and a long-lasting battery providing up to 40 minutes of runtime.

articles.title: Progresso debuts limited-edition savory "soup drops" for cold and flu season
articles.author: Eastidahonews.Com Staff
articles.summary: Progresso, a brand of General Mills, launched 'Soup Drops,' a hard candy with soup flavor. These savory drops, available for a limited time in January, went on sale online and sold out quickly. Each order includes a can of Progresso Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup and is priced at $2.49.

articles.title: Hobby Lobby launches new San Jose store as retailer preps expansion
articles.author: George Avalos
articles.summary: Hobby Lobby has opened a new store in San Jose. This opening signifies the introduction of Hobby Lobby's existing range of products and services to a new customer base in the San Jose area.

articles.title: How to stay in the loop with Samsung's new Galaxy S25 series launch event
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to unveil its new Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22nd. The Galaxy S25 devices are rumored to feature a more rounded design, Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, and camera upgrades. The Galaxy S25 Ultra model is expected to receive a minor redesign with a curvier chassis, and there are rumors of a Galaxy S25 Slim model.

articles.title: Aldi launches brand new Molton Brown candle dupes for £71 less & there's even matching diffusers
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Aldi is launching the Hotel Collection Luxury Aroma Candle and Hotel Collection Luxury Aromas Reed Diffuser, inspired by Molton Brown products, on January 19th. The candle and diffuser will be available for £5.99 each in Black Pepper and Vetiver, Rose, Rhubarb and Musk or, Sea Salt and Fennel scents. The candle is designed to last for approximately 80 hours of burning, while the diffuser is designed to last up to 12 weeks.

articles.title: Handcrafted donut spot known for sweet and savoury bites to open first Vancouver location
articles.summary: Fresh St. Market is introducing its donut brand, Peak Donuts, to its Vancouver House location. Peak Donuts is known for its unique savoury creations like the cheddar and onion fritter and also offers flavours like Tiramisu and Strawberry Pistachio. The opening date is yet to be announced, but Peak Donuts already has locations in Surrey, Langley, Kelowna, and Whistler.

articles.title: Where Does Trader Joe's New Clover Gouda Cheese Come From?
articles.author: Kurt Suchman
articles.summary: Trader Joe's is introducing Clover Gouda cheese to its stores, sourced from the Family Nijland creamery in the Netherlands. This gouda cheese features a distinct floral quality due to the cow's diet of fresh grass and clover, offering a rich, creamy texture with nutty, sweet flavor. Trader Joe's suggests pairing it with apples and almonds.

articles.title: District Eagle: Exclusive First Look Inside D.C.'s Newest Gay Bar
articles.author: John Riley
articles.summary: District Eagle, a new LGBTQ bar, is launching on January 22, featuring a speakeasy entrance, kink-friendly environment, and upstairs space called Alice, open on Friday and Saturday nights.  The bar is designed as a cruising bar for the LGBTQ community, offering unique programming and special events.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops New Type of Disposable Bag (TPL-469)
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: An inventor has created "FRIENDLY BAGS," a new type of disposable bag intended to replace plastic bags. Submitted to InventHelp, the bag is designed to be environmentally friendly and is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers.

articles.title: BRAND NEW Screen Door
articles.author: Brett Keeler
articles.summary: A new sliding screen door is available, constructed with heavy-duty, rust-resistant aluminum. The door's width is 36 inches, and the height is adjustable between 93.5 and 96.5 inches. Options include free pickup or paid delivery and installation.

articles.title: Junk removal company donates thousands of brand new clothing items from abandoned warehouse
articles.summary: Junk King cleared 37 cubic meters of new clothing from a warehouse. Junk King donated the clothing to the Salvation Army.

articles.title: Shoppers Say This Dual-Action Dry Shampoo Foam Gives ‘Great Volume'
articles.author: Taylor Lane
articles.summary: A new dual-action dry shampoo foam has been introduced, combining the cleansing power of dry shampoo with the volumizing benefits of styling foam. This product contains ingredients like rice starch, lactic acid, and honeysuckle flower extract to strengthen hair, improve health, and moisturize the scalp. It is designed for all hair types and provides volume while extending time between washes.

articles.title: You can save $50 on a new Kindle Colorsoft e-reader if you're an Amazon Prime member
articles.author: Matthew Sholtz
articles.summary: Amazon launched the Kindle Colorsoft, their first color E Ink e-reader, featuring a 7-inch color screen based on E Ink's Kaleido 3 tech. The device includes 32GB storage, auto-adjusting front lighting, a glare-free screen, and is waterproof and is being offered at a discounted price for Prime members.

articles.title: Walmart Has Made This Subtle Change But Customers Have Noticed
articles.author: Brandee Gruener
articles.summary: Walmart has unveiled a refreshed logo featuring a brighter yellow spark and bolder blue text, marking a subtle yet noticeable change to its brand identity. The company also emphasized its move into high-tech retailing, with drone deliveries and an AI-powered shopping app. The updated look is being rolled out across stores, starting with Store 4108 in Springdale, Arkansas.

articles.title: From a new Mario Kart to mouse-like controls, these are my six biggest takeaways from ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo is revealing key points about the Nintendo Switch 2.

articles.title: Guide on how to access the Switch 2 before official release
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Nintendo is showcasing the Switch 2 console on a tour before its official release. The public can preview the Switch 2 at live events worldwide. The release date is currently undisclosed.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Direct: See event date, games, what to expect and where to watch
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Nintendo is scheduled to host the Nintendo Switch 2 Direct on April 2, 2025, where they are expected to unveil information about the new Nintendo Switch 2 gaming console. The presentation will expand on details from the announcement trailer and offer insights into hardware and software features, alongside upcoming games like a new Mario Kart. Nintendo is also likely to disclose the Switch 2's pricing and release date during this event.

articles.title: REDMAGIC X Golden Saga Limited Edition è ufficiale con Snapdragon 8 Elite
articles.summary: Nubia's RedMagic has launched the RedMagic 10 Pro series and the RedMagic X Golden Saga Limited Edition gaming smartphones. The RedMagic X Golden Saga Limited Edition features a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, 24GB RAM, 1TB storage, advanced cooling, and a premium design. The RedMagic 10 Pro series includes models with Snapdragon 8 Elite processors, 144Hz displays, and 7,050mAh batteries.

articles.title: Eliza wakes up: $420K AI robot brings emotional intelligence to life
articles.author: Jijo Malayil
articles.summary: Eliza Wakes Up, in partnership with Old World Labs, is developing a humanoid robot named Eliza. This 5'10" robot features realistic facial expressions, dynamic movement, natural speech and is powered by AI. It is capable of performing complex tasks and interacting with people.

articles.title: This Is the Best Smelling Body Wash We've Ever Tried
articles.author: Allure
articles.summary: Necessaire introduces The Body Wash with Hinoki scent. Saltair launches Salt Water Vanilla Body Wash with a beachy vanilla twist. Sol de Janeiro presents Delícia Drench Moisturizing Shower Oil featuring a blend of salted caramel, pistachio, and vanilla.

articles.title: Reviewers Say These Sneakers Were Recommended By Their Podiatrist — And They're Up To 50% Off
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: New Balance's Fresh Foam X 1080 V13 running shoes are available at a discount on Amazon and Zappos, with prices as low as $82. The shoes feature Fresh Foam X technology for a bouncy midsole, breathable mesh uppers, reflective elements, and come in various sizes and widths, making them a comfortable and supportive option for runners and walkers.

articles.title: 'Amazon's £30 vacuum gets condensation off my windows in seconds'
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: Beldray launched the BEL0749 Cordless Window Vac, priced at £30, to combat condensation, offering a streak-free finish. Amazon shoppers have reviewed the product, giving it an average score of four out of five stars. Alternative window vacuum cleaners like the Karcher WV 5 Plus and the Tower TWV10 Cordless Handheld Window Vacuum Cleaner are also mentioned as alternatives.

articles.title: Dyson's cordless vacuum is half price: Shop now before this deal ends
articles.author: Casey Del Basso
articles.summary: Dyson's cordless vacuum is currently on sale for 50% off on Amazon. The vacuum features powerful suction, whole-machine filtration, multiple cleaning modes and lightweight design.

articles.title: Some like it hot: The Honor X9c takes it to the boiling point
articles.author: Ed Uy
articles.summary: Honor Philippines launched the Honor X9c 5G smartphone on January 6, 2024, emphasizing its durability with features like all-angle drop resistance and an IP65M rating. The phone also features a 6.78-inch AMOLED display, a 108MP OIS camera, and a 6,600mAh battery with 66W SuperCharge. Pre-order promotions from January 10 to 24, 2025, include a free Honor Gift Box and a chance to win a Rolex Datejust.

articles.title: Analysts Say Nintendo Switch 2 Won't Outsell the Original Switch, but That's Okay
articles.author: Rebekah Valentine
articles.summary: Nintendo has officially announced the Nintendo Switch 2. Analysts generally agree that Nintendo's approach of making the Nintendo Switch 2 a bigger and better version of the original is a good strategy. Experts predict it will appeal to early adopters eager to upgrade.

articles.title: POCO X7 5G: Budget-Friendly 5G Powerhouse Launched
articles.author: IANS
articles.summary: POCO launched its latest smartphone, the POCO X7 5G, in India, designed for durability, performance, and value. It features a 1.5K Amoled display with Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2, a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultra Chipset, and a 5500mAh battery with 45W HyperCharge technology. The POCO X7 5G is available on Flipkart starting at Rs 19,999.

articles.title: JSW MG Motor forays into 'accessible luxury' electric car segment
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: JSW MG Motor India unveiled two new electric car models, the MG Cyberster (an all-electric Roadster) and the MG M9 (an electric three-row limousine), at the Bharat Mobility Global Expo 2025 under its new luxury brand channel, MG Select. Pre-reservations for both models commenced on Friday. This launch contributes to the company's aim to have the widest EV portfolio with five different models.

articles.title: Your Snapdragon phone is finally ready to be your laptop, too
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Smartphones are increasingly capable of functioning as laptops due to advancements in processors like the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite. Google's Pixel 8 series has introduced DisplayPort Alt Mode via USB-C to improve display output. Companies like Samsung with DeX and Motorola with Ready For already have solutions that change the look and behavior of the operating system when connected to an external display. Additionally, companies like NexDock and Uperfect offer all-in-one solutions.

articles.title: I'm glad Switch 2 is a slick update - but I hope there's a surprise in store
articles.author: Alan Wen
articles.summary: Nintendo officially announced the Nintendo Switch 2, a direct continuation of the original Switch with backwards compatibility for both physical and digital Switch 1 games. The new console features detachable Joy-Cons and is described as bigger and slicker with a complete black design. A Switch 2 Direct is scheduled for April 2nd.

articles.title: Amazon's £30 window vacuum dupe clears condensation in seconds
articles.author: Shania King-Soyza
articles.summary: Beldray's BEL0749 Cordless Window Vac, available on Amazon for £30, effectively clears condensation from windows and shower screens, delivering a streak-free finish. Karcher's WV 5 Plus can be found for £89.99. The Tower TWV10 Cordless Handheld Window Vacuum Cleaner is available at Argos for £29. Users praise the Beldray's ease of use, portability, and cleaning effectiveness on various surfaces.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland selling ‘game-changer' for cleaning houses – it costs just €29.99 and comes with huge perks
articles.author: Emma Kilcawley Hemani
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland has launched a 1500W Steam Mop & Handheld Steam Cleaner, reduced from €39.99 to €29.99, featuring a detachable handheld cleaner and a 30-second steam-ready time with 15 minutes of operation. Additionally, Lidl is now selling Vacuum Sealer Rolls for €4.99 per pack, designed for airtight sealing to extend food freshness.

articles.title: Bharat Mobility Global expo: Mercedes Benz unveils Concept CLA Class, Maybach EQS 680 Night Series
articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz unveiled the Concept CLA Class, an electric successor to the CLA, and the Maybach EQS 680 Night Series at the Bharat Mobility Expo 2025. The Concept CLA boasts a range of over 750 km on a single charge and supports SAE Level 2 semi-autonomous driving. The Maybach EQS 680 SUV Night Series, priced at Rs 2.63 crore, features blacked-out design elements and retains the dual electric motor setup with a WLTP-claimed range of 611 km.

articles.title: How to Use Sora to Create an AI Video
articles.author: Carly Quellman
articles.summary: OpenAI launched Sora, a text-to-video AI platform designed for marketers, educators, and content creators. It allows users to generate short, professional-looking videos from text prompts, animate images, and remix existing videos. Sora is accessible to ChatGPT Pro and Plus subscribers.

articles.title: Skylar Enters a New Era with Nude Skin: Your Scent, Elevated
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Starco Brands' Skylar has launched Nude Skin, a new eau de parfum. The fragrance features notes of tiger orchid, warm vanilla, and golden amber and is available in 50mL and 10mL rollerball sizes at Skylar.com, Sephora.com, and Sephora stores.

articles.title: Nintendo's Switch 2 is here ' sort of
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Nintendo is hinting at the arrival of the Switch 2. While details are vague, the mention suggests a potential new product launch or introduction from the company.

articles.title: Carlsbad-based Bitchin' Sauce recently landed a dream account: Starbucks. Here's how they did it.
articles.author: Roxana Popescu
articles.summary: Starbucks is exploring customizable food options. This indicates a potential new direction for the company's food offerings to better meet customer preferences.

articles.title: Amazon has The Smooth Shot from Drybar on sale for beauty fans who prefer a paddle versus a round blowout brush
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Drybar's blow-dryer brush combines hot air and a paddle brush structure to detangle, tame frizz, and add shine using ionic technology. The ergonomic airbrush maximizes airflow for faster drying with a broad, flat base, while nylon and tufted bristles create tension. It features three temperature settings and is available with free overnight shipping for Prime members on Amazon.

articles.title: Beyond kimchi and kombucha
articles.author: Prachi Rathi
articles.summary: Brown Koji Boy launched koji-based products in 2022, including extracts, syrups, condiments, and miso, using ingredients sourced locally from India. The products, priced from ₹185, are available on their website and select supermarkets and focus on incorporating into Indian cuisine.

articles.title: Beyond kimchi and kombucha: How Goa-based brand Brown Koji Boy is redefining fermentation
articles.author: Prachi Rathi
articles.summary: Brown Koji Boy launched in 2022 and produces koji-based extracts, syrups, and condiments, focusing on gluten-free and locally sourced ingredients. The company sells products through B2B channels, online platforms, and select supermarkets, creating products for Indian households to use these products. Products are priced at ₹185 onwards and are available on brownkojiboy.com

articles.title: First black commercial olive oil producer
articles.author: e NCA
articles.summary: Loyiso Manga's Ubuntu Extra Virgin Olive Oil is now available at SPAR, Woolworths, Checkers, and Takealot. The African-inspired bottled product marks Manga as South Africa's first black commercial olive oil producer.

articles.title: Cubs bring back baby blue uniforms
articles.summary: The Chicago Cubs introduced a new Blues Alternate uniform, presented by Motorola Razr. The new uniform celebrates the team's history and Chicago's influence on the electric blues movement.

articles.title: Your Windowsill, Under The Couch, And 26 Other Places In Your Home That You Should Probably Clean ASAP
articles.author: Ana Maria Glavan
articles.summary: The article highlights various cleaning products available on Amazon, including melamine sponges for door knobs, washing machine cleaning tablets, dryer vent cleaning systems, all-purpose paste, multi-purpose OxiClean powder, wall cleaner, mattress vacuum, lint roller, cleaning brush kit, OXO duster, microfiber cloths, vacuum hose attachment, CLR (calcium, lime, and rust remover), Affresh cleaning tablets, TICARVE Dust Cleaning Gel, cleaning cups, Glisten foaming cleaner, adjustable duster brush, stain cleaner, bottle-cleaning tablets, Oh Yuk cleaner, Bar Keepers Friend cleansing and polishing powder, food grade mineral oil, FlexiSnake Drain Weasel, liquid-free, reusable rolling screen cleaner. These products target various cleaning needs around the house, from kitchen appliances to bathroom surfaces.

articles.title: GROWNSY LAUNCHES NEW BABY BOTTLE WASHER DESIGNED TO SAVE TIME FOR MODERN PARENTS
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: GROWNSY has launched the Baby Bottle Washer, an appliance designed for modern parents to efficiently clean and sterilize baby bottles and accessories. The Baby Bottle Washer features four flexible modes: Wash, AUTO, Sterilizer, and Storage. It is available for purchase at GROWNSY, Amazon, and select retailers.

articles.title: Home Bargains fans impressed by £4 'magic cream' that 'plumps and firms' skin
articles.author: Charlotte Smith
articles.summary: Home Bargains has launched Victoria Harper's 'Mystical Cream,' a £3.99 beauty product, as a budget-friendly alternative to Charlotte Tilbury's Magic Cream. The 'Mystical Cream' shares several key ingredients with its pricier counterpart and aims to plump and firm the skin. TikTok users have praised the product's similarity to the more expensive brand and its hydrating effect.

articles.title: Haidilao S'pore has S$48.80+ golden mala yu sheng for CNY 2025
articles.author: Celeste Ng
articles.summary: Haidilao Singapore is launching new Lunar New Year offerings available until Feb 12, 2025. The new Fortune Yu Sheng is priced at S$48.80 and available in traditional and mala flavors. The company also introduces seasonal beverages such as Roselle Passion Hawthorn Smoothie (S$3.80), Easy Avocado Smoothie (S$5.80), and Sunlit Grapefruit Bliss (S$3.80), and a Spring Festival Gift Collection with plushies and magnets.

articles.title: How to Use Sora to Create an AI Video
articles.author: Carly Quellman
articles.summary: OpenAI launched Sora, a text-to-video AI platform that transforms text prompts into videos. It is accessible to ChatGPT Pro and Plus subscribers and offers features like generating short videos from text, animating images, and remixing videos. Sora provides different subscription plans that offer priority videos with resolutions up to 1080p and the ability to download without watermarks.

articles.title: Best mini vacuum cleaner for home: Deep clean your sofas, mattresses, windows and more with handheld vacuum cleaners
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: The article introduces several new mini vacuum cleaners from companies like AGARO, YETI, SHAYONAM, Ambrane, ALWAFLI, InstaCuppa, Eureka Forbes, OM CLAER, and IDELLA. These products feature various capabilities like USB charging, strong suction, portable designs, and specialized features for pet hair removal or car cleaning, catering to quick and efficient cleaning tasks. Each product details customer feedback and key features for diverse cleaning needs.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland fans rushing to buy new Dyson vacuum dupes in middle aisle – and they're €250 cheaper
articles.author: Isabela Boechat
articles.summary: Aldi Ireland has launched the Cyclonic Stick Vacuum Cleaner for €49.99, boasting features similar to the Dyson V8. Also, Aldi launched Ambaino Midi Dehumidifier with a capacity of two litres and will retail for just €99.99.

articles.title: I tested an ink pen that digitizes your handwriting, but the app makes it truly useful
articles.author: Kyle Kucharski
articles.summary: Nuwa Pen, an actual ink pen, captures handwriting with three tiny cameras and saves it in a digital library via an app. Users can search their scribbles by content and interact with a built-in large language model. The software is still being improved for 100% accurate results.

articles.title: How the iRobot Roomba Learns Your Cleaning Habits
articles.author: Marty Spargo
articles.summary: iRobot's Roomba uses AI algorithms and mapping systems to create customized maps of homes for cleaning. It understands and adapts to user cleaning habits, ensuring thorough and personalized cleaning experiences. The Roomba offers advanced features that aim to make cleaning more efficient.

articles.title: 'Lovely' M&S £10 perfume that's 'very similar' to popular £107 designer version
articles.author: Nicola Roy
articles.summary: M&S has recently launched a new fragrance that is being compared to Kayali's fragrance. The fragrance features notes of pistachio, tuberose, and tonka bean. Shoppers are saying the new M&S fragrance is a more affordable version of the Kayali fragrance.

articles.title: 34 'Travel' Versions Of Products You'll Wanna Buy And Then Keep In Your Suitcase For Your Next Trip
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article features an I Dew Care "Tap Secret" mattifying powder shampoo, designed for on-the-go use. It also highlights Alleyoop's Pen Pal, a 4-in-1 makeup pen featuring eyeliner, brow liner, lip liner, and highlighter. Further, Onelogy is mentioned with their tablet-to-gel freeze-dried serums, offering travel-friendly skincare solutions. These products cater to travelers seeking convenient and space-saving options.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Schedule and Details Revealed Worldwide
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Nintendo has revealed the Nintendo Switch 2, a next-generation handheld console, announced on January 16, 2025. The console features a new design with vibrant orange and light blue grips, detachable Joy-Cons with a keypad, and backward compatibility with original Nintendo Switch games. Nintendo plans to introduce the Switch 2 through global 'Switch 2 Experience' events.

articles.title: Nomination period for the Broermann Medical Innovation Award started
articles.author: Media Outreach
articles.summary: Galaxy Macau, in partnership with Guojiao 1573, has launched two new Baijiu products: 'Guojiao 1573 · Auspicious Spirit Snake' and 'Luzhou Laojiao · 2025 Year of the Yi Si Lunar New Year Gift Baijiu.' These limited-edition liquors, featuring unique designs, are available at the Guojiao 1573 Tasting Festival pop-up store until March 31, 2025, offering tasting experiences and pairings with cuisine at select restaurants within Galaxy Macau and StarWorld Hotel.

articles.title: Feeling Betrayed by Amazon's Move to Phase Out 'Try Before You Buy'?
articles.author: Faye Brennan
articles.summary: Amazon is phasing out its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allowed Prime members to try on clothing items before purchasing. This service will end on January 31, 2025. Amazon is replacing it with new AI-powered features such as virtual try-on, personalized size recommendations, and improved size charts to enhance the online shopping experience.

articles.title: Android phone makers want your smartphone to survive a kitchen nightmare
articles.author: Brady Snyder
articles.summary: Honor launched its Magic 7 series, including the Magic 7 Pro and Magic 7 Lite, showcasing their extreme durability through tests like dishwashing and cutting board use. Other companies like OnePlus with OnePlus 13 and Motorola with Motorola Moto G Power are also emphasizing durability, achieving IP68/IP69 ratings that withstand extreme conditions. These smartphones are now more resistant to damage from dust, water, and physical stress.

articles.title: I made 3 meals for £23 – How Yazio changed my food shop
articles.author: Katie Collier
articles.summary: Yazio is a recipe app that provides users with meal ideas for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The app categorizes recipes by type, such as vegan, high protein, and low calorie, and offers features like 'get inspired' sections and the ability to adjust serving portions. Users can track their nutrition and progress with features like intermittent fasting tracking and diary sections for meal planning.

articles.title: I made 3 meals for under £23 – How this app transformed my weekly food shop
articles.author: Katie Collier
articles.summary: The Yazio app offers a variety of recipes categorized by meal type, dietary preference, and occasion, aiding users in meal planning and grocery shopping. It includes features like recipe customization for serving sizes and nutritional tracking, with options for tracking intermittent fasting progress, enhancing the user's mealtime experience by introducing different recipes.

articles.title: Ampere Magnus Neo Electric Scooter Launch: Price, Range, Charging Time, Speed, Features and More
articles.author: Richa Barua
articles.summary: Ampere is launching the Magnus Neo electric scooter, an upgraded version of the EX variant. The new scooter features a 2.3 kWh battery, a 100 km range, a top speed of 63 km/h, advanced connectivity options, and enhanced safety features. Deliveries are expected to begin by the end of January 2025.

articles.title: Zomato introduces 'veg mode' fee; scraps move after social media backlash
articles.author: ETtech
articles.summary: Zomato introduced and then rolled back a fee for users of its 'veg mode' feature. Separately, Zomato-owned Blinkit launched the Bistro app, and Swiggy launched Snacc, both standalone apps aiming for 10-minute food delivery.

articles.title: Sweater Shavers, Stain Removers, And 23 Other Products To Help You Revive Your Favorite, Worn-Out Wardrobe Pieces
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article showcases several products available on Amazon that focus on cleaning, repairing, or altering existing items.  These include fabric shavers, stain removers, shoe stretch sprays, repair glues, and dyes for items like shoes, clothing, and accessories.  The products aim to extend the life and improve the appearance of well-loved possessions.

articles.title: A new era dawns: Redmi Note 14 series set to launch in Nigeria this January!
articles.author: BI Africa
articles.summary: Xiaomi is preparing to launch the Redmi Note 14 series in Nigeria, aiming to address the unique needs of Nigerian consumers. The Redmi Note 14 series is expected to feature long-lasting battery life and advanced connectivity.

articles.title: Fabric shaver that makes clothes look 'brand new effortlessly' now £10
articles.author: Léonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Philips Fabric Shaver is available on Amazon for £9.99, while Philips sells it for £15.99. JML Bobble Off Remover is available at Argos for £8. Steamery Pilo 1 Fabric Shaver is priced at £45 at Dunelm.

articles.title: Morrisons launches huge new free delivery system for customers
articles.author: Monica Charsley
articles.summary: Morrisons has launched 'Morrisons Clinic', a new online private prescription service in partnership with Phlo, offering free medication delivery for 12 conditions to customers in England. This service aims to provide convenient access to medication without a GP appointment, addressing healthcare accessibility concerns.

articles.title: Fresh and sweet
articles.author: Business Bytes
articles.summary: Lagos Intermarché has introduced two new crepe toppings: 'Delícia Rocher' with cocoa cream, hazelnuts, and almonds, and 'Bueno Tentação' featuring a white cream topping with a velvety texture and hazelnuts. These new crepes are made with a fresh, traditional base and are available at the Lagos Intermarché patisserie counter.

articles.title: Home Bargains sends shoppers into meltdown over £4 family pyjamas
articles.author: Monica Charsley
articles.summary: Home Bargains has launched a new matching pyjama range ahead of Valentine's Day, targeting babies, children, and parents. The "Originals Ladies Mini Me Pyjamas" feature a heart print, elastic waistband, and are available in sizes 8-20, with matching items for coordinated outfits.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 confirmed for launch this year
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Nintendo has confirmed the release of the Nintendo Switch 2 this year, with more details on pricing and specifications expected at the Nintendo Direct event on April 2. The new console is anticipated to build upon the hybrid home-portable model of the original Switch, possibly as an enhanced 'Switch Pro'. Analysts believe the Switch 2 will debut after June 2025.

articles.title: A New Era Dawns: Redmi Note 14 series set to launch in Nigeria this January!
articles.author: Premium Times
articles.summary: Xiaomi is launching the Redmi Note 14 series in Nigeria. The company aims to bring cutting-edge technology to the Nigerian market with this launch.

articles.title: Struggling with Taobao? It's now available in English for Hongkongers
articles.author: Gavin Yeung
articles.summary: Taobao has launched an English-language interface for its app, targeting English-speaking users. This new service includes features like English product descriptions, local currency conversions, and simplified navigation. New users can also benefit from promotional offers, including discounts and free shipping.

articles.title: 광주시,  ‘광주시 청년지원센터 창업누림입주기업 홍보전' 개최
articles.author: 오경희 기자
articles.summary: Gwangju City hosted a promotional exhibition for startups from the 'Startup Nurim' program. Companies like Hyangyu, Artry Angle, Artroun, and Orbit, which are focused on local products, video production, education programs, and study operations, were featured. The event aimed to boost these companies and stimulate the local economy.

articles.title: Nodewap Technology Pvt. Ltd.: Revolutionizing IT Services with a Vision for Bihar
articles.summary: Nodewap Technology Pvt. Ltd. offers various IT services, including website development, app development, digital marketing, and gaming solutions. The company develops high-quality games using technologies like Unity and HTML5, which cater to various client needs.

articles.title: How to watch Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025 — Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25 Ultra and more
articles.author: Josh Render
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to unveil the Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25 Plus, and Galaxy S25 Ultra at the upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event, along with the new One UI 7 interface, which includes updated AI features and security improvements. Samsung will reveal details of Project Moohan, an XR headset running on the Snapdragon XR Plus Gen 2 chip, allowing users to switch between Home Space and Full Space modes.

articles.title: Forsta Adds AI Capabilities to Human Experience Platform
articles.summary: Forsta has introduced new AI capabilities to its Human Experience (HX) platform, including AI Summarize, AI Compose, and AI Recommend. These features are designed to help organizations gain deeper insights, save time, and take action to improve customer and employee experiences by leveraging advancements in generative AI, natural language processing, and advanced analytics.

articles.title: Nadia Partners Originates Beacon AI Centers to Advance AI Data Center Development in Alberta
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Beacon AI Centers, originated by Nadia Partners, is emerging from stealth with plans to develop 1.8 GW of data center capacity by 2027. The company aims to address the increasing demand for AI infrastructure with an energy-first approach, focusing on scalable and sustainable power solutions for hyperscaler customers.

articles.title: The Nintendo Switch 2 is finally, officially revealed
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Nintendo revealed the Switch 2, its new console, in a video on YouTube.

articles.title: Loạt dự án chung cư cao cấp tại Hà Nội sắp bán, giá thấp nhất 65 triệu đồng/m2
articles.author: Lệ Chi
articles.summary: WhiskyFlavour introduces a whiskey subscription box service that delivers curated selections of whiskeys directly to customers. The boxes include full-size bottles or samples, tasting notes, exclusive releases, and pairing suggestions. This service aims to provide a convenient and personalized way for whiskey enthusiasts to discover new brands and expand their knowledge.

articles.title: Latest Specifications and Prices for Oppo A16: HD Plus Eye-Care Screen, Stylish Anti-Fingerprint Design
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Oppo launched the Oppo A16 smartphone in 2021, which has retained popularity into 2025. The Oppo A16 combines elegance, efficiency, and durability, targeting users who value aesthetics and functionality; and is equipped with the MediaTek Helio G35 processor and a 5,000 mAh battery.

articles.title: Ryanair cancels flights to Spain due to conflict over transport rates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Ryanair announced a reduction in its flight operations to Spain for the summer season of 2025 due to escalating fees imposed by Aena, Spain's national airport operator. This change will result in 800,000 fewer available aircraft seats for travelers, with flights to some destinations being entirely discontinued and routes to others seeing a noticeable decrease in frequency. Ryanair is considering expanding operations in nations such as Italy,Sweden,Croatia,Hungary,and Morocco.

articles.title: 29 Pieces Of Cozy Home Decor If You're In Your Winter Hibernation Era
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: The content features a variety of home goods and products, many available on Amazon. These include items like the Mellanni microfiber sheet set, Samsung Frame TV, and Ember temperature control smart mug, highlighting new or interesting options for consumers to enhance their homes and lifestyles.

articles.title: Insta360's Flow Pro 2 gimbal offers a sturdier build and a selfie mirror
articles.author: Lawrence Bonk
articles.summary: Insta360 is launching the Flow 2 Pro, an upgraded smartphone gimbal. The Flow 2 Pro features a sturdier build for enhanced durability and a stronger tripod. It also includes an exterior selfie mirror.

articles.title: 2025 Renault Captur: Facelifted French SUV to take on Mitsubishi ASX twin in Australia
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Renault is set to launch the updated Captur model locally in the second half of 2025. The updated Captur will face competition from a new rival.

articles.title: Best 7kg washing machines in 2025: Top picks with advanced features from LG, Whirlpool and other big brands
articles.author: Affiliate Desk
articles.summary: The article introduces and compares several 7kg washing machines from brands such as LG, Whirlpool, and Godrej. Key features discussed include LG's TurboDrum and Inverter technologies, Whirlpool's 6th Sense technology, and Godrej's advanced features and ActivMix technology, all with a 5-star energy efficiency rating. These models cater to small to medium-sized households, typically range in price from Rs. 20,000 to Rs. 40,000, and come with a standard warranty.

articles.title: Laundry Detergent Sheets Market to Grow by USD 322 Million (2025-2029), Driven by Product Launches; AI Impact on Market Trends
articles.author: PR Newswire
org: LG Household and Health Care Ltd.
Venus Laboratories DBA Earth Friendly Products
articles.summary: The global laundry detergent sheets market is projected to grow by USD 322 million from 2025-2029, driven by increasing product launches. Companies are focusing on eco-friendly and sustainable options, with key players like Church and Dwight Co. Inc., Unilever PLC, and others introducing new products. The market is experiencing growth due to the demand for convenient and environmentally conscious laundry solutions.

articles.title: Pick, Pack, or Die January 16, 2025 5:18 PM Subscribe
articles.summary: The comedy thriller novel "Pick, Pack, or Die" is being launched. The book centers around the Zing Warehouse and its substantial robotic workforce, exploring themes of automation, same-hour delivery, and artificial intelligence.

articles.title: 4 reasons foldable phones are actually stronger than you think
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: Samsung's Z Fold 6 and Z Flip 6 now offer basic dust resistance with an IP48 rating. Motorola's Razr models have achieved IP5X for dust resistance, and OnePlus 13 has IP69 certification . Foldable phone screens are also becoming less prone to scratching and creasing due to tougher materials and better protective films.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Price, Release Date, Specs & Games Update
articles.author: Coming Soon
articles.summary: Nintendo officially revealed the Nintendo Switch 2. The announcement video highlighted the console's new design. Nintendo Switch 2 is the successor to the original Nintendo Switch.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim may steal the show at Unpacked - even if it doesn't release
articles.author: Kerry Wan
articles.summary: Samsung is anticipated to unveil the Galaxy S25 series smartphones at its upcoming Unpacked event. Rumors suggest the introduction of a new Galaxy S25 "Slim" edition, featuring a thinner design measuring 6.4mm in width.

articles.title: Nintendo introduces the bigger, more powerful Switch 2
articles.author: Screenshot
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2 in 2025. The new console features a larger screen, a new USB-C port, and a U-shaped kickstand. The design maintains elements of the original Switch while offering upgrades.

articles.title: Laundry Detergent Sheets Market to Grow by USD 322 Million (2025-2029), Driven by Product Launches; AI Impact on Market Trends
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Technavio reports the global laundry detergent sheets market is projected to grow by USD 322 million from 2025-2029, with an estimated CAGR of 6.9%. This growth is attributed to increasing product launches within the market.

articles.title: Bubbles Tea & Juice Co. opens in Grandview next week
articles.author: Business Journal
articles.summary: A Columbus juice and smoothie brand is expanding. The brand will open its newest shop next week.

articles.title: Progresso launches Soup Drops, a hard candy that's ‘soup you can suck on'
articles.author: NBC Bay Area
articles.summary: Progresso has launched a new product called 'Soup Drops,' a savory lozenge that replicates the taste of their Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup. This launch coincides with National Soup Month and represents Progresso's first venture into 'soup you can suck on.'

articles.title: How to find the perfect nude lipstick for every skin tone
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: This article gives consumers advice on finding their perfect nude lipstick. It addresses elements such as undertone and finish to guide the selection process, functioning as an indirect advertisement or introduction to diverse lipstick options.

articles.title: Toggle3D.ai�Announces CEO Evan Gappelberg Acquires�2,566,666 Shares of Company Stock
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: ToggleStudios, an AI-powered company, introduces its AI photography service. This service creates hyper-realistic product images from 2D images and 3D models.

articles.title: Warning over invasive reptiles slipping into northern Europe Tech and Science Daily podcast
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: Nintendo will reveal the Nintendo Switch 2.

articles.title: Nintendo says its new Switch 2 console will be released in 2025
articles.author: The Call
articles.summary: Nintendo revealed its newest console, the Nintendo Switch 2. The announcement was highly anticipated, however, the company's Tokyo-traded shares slumped 4.3% following the reveal.

articles.title: 'Soup you can suck on': Progresso unveils chicken noodle soup-flavored hard candy
articles.author: Herald-Tribune Sarasota
articles.summary: Progresso released a limited-edition chicken noodle soup-flavored hard candy during flu and cold season. The new product offers a convenient way to enjoy soup-like flavors.

articles.title: Why did Samsung overlook in-house memory for Galaxy S25?
articles.author: Korea Times
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics unveiled its newest Galaxy S25 smartphone families during a Galaxy Unpacked event. The unveiling event took place in London, showcasing the holographic ad for the Galaxy S25.

articles.title: General Mills debuts hard-candy Progresso Soup Drops
articles.author: Business Journal
articles.summary: General Mills launched Progresso Soup Drops, a limited-edition cough drop flavored like Progresso's chicken soup. The product quickly sold out upon release, but General Mills is producing more.

articles.title: Neil Young Declares ‘Big Change' Is Comin' on New Song With Chrome Hearts
articles.author: Rollingstone
articles.summary: Young is previewing their new album. The preview is the first available to the public, signaling an upcoming product launch.

articles.title: 10 new beauty launches you cannot miss
articles.author: Rupam Jain
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new beauty and skincare products. Soulflower introduced Rosemary Redensyl Hair Growth Serum for hair loss and regrowth. Fashion Colour launched the BFF Lip Balm collection for lip hydration. The Body Shop released Black Grape Body Mist, and POND'S introduced Youthful Miracle Hexyl Retinol Complex Renew and Repair Eye Cream. Swiss Beauty launched Select Game Changer Serum Foundation, while SUGAR released Cloud Nine Niacinamide Glow Blush. The Face Shop introduced Alltimate Panthenol 2% Exfoliating Gel, anthi launched Anti-Thinning Hair Oil, Kama Ayurveda launched Shea Lotus and Almond Kokum Body Butters, and Rivona Naturals introduced HA Aqua Moisturizing Cream.
